UPDATE t_message_room
room_title = #{roomTitle},
room_intro = #{roomIntro},
room_bulletin = #{roomBulletin},
category_id = #{categoryId},
updater_id = #{updaterId},
`update_time` = STR_TO_DATE(#{updateTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),
record_flag = #{recordFlag},
mapper.select: SELECT record_id,category_id,sender_id,receiver_id,room_id,content, DATE_FORMAT(record_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') record_time,record_flag FROM t_message WHERE record_id = #{recordId} AND record_flag = 1
